flawed_nl_solution:
There will be 50 x 2 = <<50*2=1000>>1000 parents that are expected to attend.
20/2 = <<20/2=10>>10 administrators will attend.
Hence, 50 graduates + 1000 parents + 20 teachers + 10 administrators = 1080 chairs must be prepared.
#### 1080

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
